system.description:
A glass or ceramic jug which can pour forth different liquids on command.

  • Naming a liquid: If the name of one of the following liquids is spoken out loud and the jug tipped, the liquid will pour forth up to the quantities listed:

    1. Acid: Up to 1 vial. Enough to dissolve 1 square foot of wood or metal over 1 turn.
    2. Ale: Up to 32 pints.
    3. Fresh water: Up to 64 pints.
    4. Oil: Up to 1 pint.
    5. Poison: Up to 1 vial. If ingested, the victim suffers [[/r 4d10]] hit points of damage (save versus poison for half). There is a [[/r 1d100]]{40%} chance of the poison being detected by scent before drinking.
    6. Salt water: Up to 128 pints.
    7. Vinegar: Up to 16 pints.
    8. Wine: Up to 8 pints.

  • Rate of pouring: Up to 1 pint per round.

  • Usage frequency: Each type of liquid may be poured at most once per day.
